sentences.en: A plastic sheet was pegged down over the compost heap to hasten decomposition.
sentences.cn: 把塑料布覆盖在肥堆上,并用木桩固定好,以加速肥料的分解.

sentences.en: Bed the roots in the compost.
sentences.cn: 把植物的根插入混合肥料中.

sentences.en: Booth and Brennan are back at the compost facility.
Compost is not necessarily pathogen - free.
sentences.cn: 堆肥并不一定需要无病原微生物.

sentences.en: Cover the seeds with a thin layer of compost, and water.
sentences.cn: 在种子上施上薄薄一层肥料, 然后浇水.

sentences.en: Cut down and compost spent cucumbers, tomatoes and other crops.
sentences.cn: 将已收获过的黄瓜、西红柿和其他作物的秧蔓割下，制成堆肥。

sentences.en: I sow the seed in pots of soil-based compost.
sentences.cn: 我把种子种在几盆掺有堆肥的土里。

sentences.en: I usually dig in a small barrow load of compost in late summer.
sentences.cn: 夏末时节，我通常会把一小车堆肥施到土里。

sentences.en: In May, mulch the bed with garden compost.
In the spring, we plunge shovels into the garden plot , turn under the dark compost.
sentences.cn: 春天, 我们用铁锨翻开园子里黑油油的沃土.

sentences.en: Organic compost costs less than chemical fertilizer, and it has other benefits.
sentences.cn: 有机肥料成本比化学肥料低, 而且还有别的好处.

sentences.en: Tamara : Oh, don't you believe it. They collect it and compost it.
sentences.cn: 塔玛拉: 啊, 你错了. 他们收集起来制作堆肥.

sentences.en: The gardener dug the compost in.
They make compost out of all kinds of waste.
sentences.cn: 他们用各种废料制造堆肥。

sentences.en: We enriched the soil with compost.
sentences.cn: 我们给土地施混合肥料。

trans.tran_en: a mixture of decayed plants, leaves etc used to improve the quality of soil

trans.tran_cn: 施堆肥，把（蔬菜等）制成堆肥
